sentences.english: Winds, heavy rain, thunder, lightning shaking the love and support.
sentences.chinese: 狂風，暴雨，雷轟，電閃搖撼着我愛你的憑據。

sentences.english: THE earth thunders with the sound of a million pounding hooves.
sentences.chinese: 百萬大蹄踏在地上，聲如巨雷轟響。

sentences.english: However, as thunder and lightning struck, the ship sank on its side.
sentences.chinese: 然而，正如雷轟，閃電擊中，船隻沉沒了關於其方。

sentences.english: Pray to the Lord , for we have had enough thunder and hail.
sentences.chinese: 這雷轟和冰雹已經夠了。

sentences.english: Xiao Gang felt like he was struck by a bolt of lightening when he heard what he said.
sentences.chinese: 聽了他的話，小剛感覺如五雷轟頂，痛苦不堪。

definition: Chakravarti raja (Sanskrit: King of Kings)/emperor in Hindu mythology
celestial troops and generals (idiom)/fig. superior forces
eta Ursae Majoris in the Big Dipper
the staff of a Buddhist monk
(archaic) the four rivers (Yangtze 長江|长江[Chang2 Jiang1], Yellow 黃河|黄河[Huang2 He2], Huai 淮河[Huai2 He2], Ji 濟水|济水[Ji3 Shui3])/(TCM) acupuncture point SJ-9
the intersection of the Moon's orbit with the ecliptic in Vedic astronomy (Sanskrit rahu)
to assist a ruler in governing a country/prime minister
